metadata.title: USN-5532-2 -- Bottle vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-5532-1 fixed a vulnerability in Bottle. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM and Ubuntu 16.04 ESM  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Bottle incorrectly handled errors during early request   binding. An attacker could possibly use this issue to disclose sensitive   information. (CVE-2022-31799)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5532-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-bottle - 0.12.7-1+deb8u1ubuntu0.1~esm1 python-bottle - 0.12.7-1+deb8u1ubuntu0.1~esm1 python-bottle-doc - 0.12.7-1+deb8u1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
